translate.name: product
translate.field_cart_multiple: User can add to cart multiple times for one purchase?
translate.field_discount: Automatically Generate Discount Code When This Product Is Ordered?
translate.field_assoc_req_prod: Product(s) Required for Access to This Product
translate.field_assoc_grant_prod: Purchasing This Product Grants Access to the Following Product(s)
translate.field_assoc_grant_group: Purchasing This Product Grants Access to the Following Group(s)
translate.field_assoc_grant_group_days: Grant access to the selected group(s) for X days
translate.field_host: Set up a hosting account when this product is ordered?
translate.field_host_allow_domain: Allow Domain Purchases with this Hosting Plan?
translate.field_modify_waive_setup: Waive setup fee when modifying service?
translate.domain_ns_transfer: I will use an existing domain name and update my nameservers only.
translate.domain_ip: All I need is an IP based hosting plan.
translate.recurr_type_aniv: Bill on Aniversary Date of Subscription
translate.weekly: Offer weekly billing schedule for this product?
translate.monthly: Offer monthly billing schedule for this product?
translate.quarterly: Offer quarterly billing schedule for this product?
translate.semianually: Offer semi-annual billing schedule for this product?
translate.anually: Offer annual billing schedule for this product?
translate.twoyear: Offer two-year billing schedule for this product?
translate.threeyear: Offer three-year billing schedule for this product?
translate.assoc_group_limited: Grant access for specified amount of days:
translate.assoc_group_subscription: Grant access while associated subscription is active
translate.trial_desc: This product is a trial for SKU %%sku%%, which can be viewed in detail here:
translate.trial_bill_desc: If you wish to cancel prior to the trial expiring, you may do so and you will not be billed for SKU %%sku2%%.
translate.trial_length_days: This trial will last for %%length%% days before it expires and you are billed for the full cost of SKU %%sku1%%.
translate.trial_length_months: This trial will last for %%length%% months before it expires and you are billed for the full cost of SKU %%sku1%%.
translate.trial_length_weeks: This trial will last for %%length%% weeks before it expires and you are billed for the full cost of SKU %%sku1%%.
translate.host_domain_opt: You must choose a 'Domain Transfer / Registration Option' to continue.
translate.host_domain_inv: You must select a valid domain name to continue.
translate.clone_error: Please enter a unique SKU for the newly cloned product
translate.clone_success: The product has been cloned, click here to view it now
